articles.author: Hugo Timms
articles.title: TikTok star’s desperate plea to Bindi - news.com.au
articles.description: A TikTok star has made a desperate plea to Australian conservationist Bindi Irwin, as one of the world’s most famous emus, Emmanuel, looks in danger of losing its life to an avian flu sweeping the US and Europe.

articles.title: Concerns that new Covid-19 subvariant could lead to new surge - Kildare Live
